page.title: 08TRADE
page.content:
{ TRADE AND SERVICES {IN LEIGH AND BRANSFORD There are two{general stores serving the area, one at the service station at Bransford and the other at the Post Office at Leigh. However, the scattered nature of the housing and the fact that there are many old people have resulted in a number of {mobile services. }There are weekly rounds by a general store, a fish- monger and a greengrocer, as well as weekly deliveries from the Post Office and stores at Leigh. A baker delivers three times per week and a milkman on alternate days.
Other services include a weekly {surgery}at Bensfield, with a system for collecting prescriptions to be made up at Malvern Link. The {mobile {library }comes monthly.
